divs: sighting detailsi work for a steel company located in east- aurora, colorado. it was wednesday, june 17th ( i believe ), late morning when this incident occurred. i was indoors at my desk- in the shipping-receiving department. it was around 11 am or so and the sky was clear with few clouds. one of the steel yard forklift drivers called in on the radio to let us know that he was looking at an object that was hovering above high in the sky. he said that he hadn't seen any kind of plane or balloon shaped like this object and no motor\engine could be heard. my manager and myself walked outside to see what he was watching. it was hard to pinpoint or see due to it's elevation. you really had to be focusing in that general area of the sky because you could lose sight of it easily but, because it stayed in one spot, we could see it. it was cigar shaped and black in color. it seemed to bend on one end. the object was elongated accross the sky but actually turned straight up and down at one point, then flattened out again. when it did this the sun reflected off one side which gave off a goldy colored sheen. it stayed in the same spot for about 35 minutes and during this time a plane circled the sky four times at a much lower elevation than the object. we were all stupified as to what the object was. a couple of our sales people inside had heard that we were watching something in the sky and came out to see for themeselves. no one could identify the object. a co-worker grabbed her camera to take pics but the object seemed not to show in any pic and we couldn't get it to come up on our cell phone cameras. the co-worker did manage to get one pic where the object could be seen but it looked like something you would see on a cellular lever under a microscope because she got the object but it also picked up three other shadow like dots near it in the sky that we did not see with the naked eye. after hovering the object moved north easterly in the sky until we could no longer see it. one observer called channel nine news to report a strange object spotted in the sky and to ask if the airforce was running a test on a plane or spycam. we thought for sure that other people had to have seen it also. it was talked about around the office for the next couple of days and we all watched the news for some kind of explanation but heard\saw nothing to explain what was in the sky. i decided for ha-ha's to pull up pics of ufo citings. some of those pictures are really rediculous but i did find a picture of a cigar shaped craft taken in 1996 in the uk that looked exactly like the object we observed.
Summary: A black shiny cigar shaped object with a slight bend hovering high in the sky then moved north easterly.
trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There was one other sighting in Denver on or around June 17th 2009
